episode_event_ch0244_ch0245_ch0246_mini/: You want us to help Professor Bellis?
That’s right!

We’ll be helping her research Pokémon Eggs from
the Galar region!

She said she wants us to raise these three
Pokémon that hatched from Eggs!

Hmm... They bring back memories of Gloria
and Victor.
So we’re each supposed to take one to raise?
That’s right! I wonder which I should choose.
You two can decide first.

Being the elitest of all of the elite, I must show
my confidence rather than seem too eager.
I think saying it aloud defeats the purpose...
Oh? You wanna come with me?
All right! Let’s be friends, Grookey!

Then I guess I’ll choose this one. Nice to meet ya,
Scorbunny!
I’ll take care of Sobble, then.

You’re very lucky. After all, as my Pokémon,
you’ve a dazzling future ahead of you.

Right, then. I’ll be reporting our progress to
Professor Bellis. In the meantime...

Once we’ve trained up these Pokémon, the
three of us can have some battles!
OK! I won’t lose!

Oh, please. The outcome is obvious. But fine,
I suppose I’ll entertain this.
Sometime later...
All right!
Heh!
Hmph.
Well then, here we go!
As for the battles...

Looks like we’re all evenly matched, with one win
and one loss.

You’re more capable than I thought. I let my
guard down.
But next time, we won’t lose! Right, Rillaboom?
We’re gonna score ourselves a victory, too!

Stop with this pointless struggle. In the end,
Inteleon and I will have the last laugh.
But really, who we truly want to beat is...
Hey!
Wow, an Inteleon! And Cinderace, too!
Even a Rillaboom!
...You thinkin’ what I’m thinkin’?
Hmph. It seems for once we’re on the same page.
Wanna try takin’ them on?
Yeah! It can count toward our research, too!
Huh? What’s all this about?

It seems there’s little choice. I suppose I can join
you just a bit longer.
